name: Vangelis Strambopoulos
personality: Brave, adventurous, and determined. He has unwavering loyalty towards his team and his country.
story: Anthis Petridis was born and raised in Athens, Greece. His father was a soldier in the Greek army, and Anthis knew from a young age that he wanted to follow in his footsteps. After completing his military service, he joined the Greek Special Forces and quickly proved himself to be a skilled and effective leader. Anthis was chosen to join the NATO forces operating in the Republic of Altis and Stratis, where he now leads his team in combat operations against the hostile forces in the region.
